title: Otome Game no Hametsu Flag shika Nai Akuyaku Reijou ni Tensei shiteshimatta... OVA
synopsis: The OVA will tell the childhood stories of the main characters, adapting from the first volume of Satoru Yamaguchi's original light novel.
